content.title: Not Today.
content.creator:
Gregory
March 12, 2025
content.content:
We didn't quite make it. Thanks to everyone for your support.
I may go ahead and make the DryAF Spools available for purchase anyway. If you would be interested in making a purchase, hit the like button please.

content.title: 48 Hours.
content.creator:
Gregory
March 9, 2025
content.content:
Hello & Welcome to the last 48 hours.
If you're sitting on the fence watching what everyone else is doing, now is your chance to be a leader and come join those of us already dedicated to the project. You won't be charged unless the project is successful, and the project won't be successful without your support.
If you're already onboard, thank you, now is a great time to go and shout about the glories to be had when backing a Kickstarter project. Tell your friends, family, people walking past you in the street. Tell everyone!
With the announcement of Sunlu's FilaDryer E2 and it's 110C temperature capability, DryAF is the perfect solution to the obvious problems of plastic spools in High Temperature Environments. No doubt there will be other dryers to come in the future and DryAF will be temperature compatible with them all.
I need your help to get DryAF into the world.

content.creator:
Gregory
February 25, 2025
content.content:
Hi,
Thank you to everyone who has supported the project, we're on the slow boat, but still on our way!
If you're on the fence, or just waiting to see what happens, don't hold back, join in now. Payment is only taken at the end of the campaign when the project is successful. You are not charged now. Your support will make a huge difference to the projects goals and give confidence to others who are also considering backing the project.
In case you missed it, we got a mention on 3D Musketeers weekly podcast, There's Salt EVERYWHERE! - PrintFixFriday 179
We dropped the reward prices a few hours before the video went live as I genuinely believe the DryAF Spools are a fantastic replacement to plastic spools, with the added bonus of fixing lots of other issues. For the cost of a single spool of high quality filament you can get a life-long reusable metal spool. It feels like a no-brainer to me!
Thanks again for your support now and in the future.

comments.text: Fingers crossed. The new FilaDryer E2 will dry at 110°C, so a spool that won't deform will be important, there!

content.content: No doubt you've all been wondering how you can print the Material ID Tags before you have opened a new refill. Well, its simple really....

content.title: Good News! Pricing Update.
content.creator:
Gregory
February 14, 2025
content.content:
Hi,
Thank you for supporting the project at this early stage. Because I feel this is such a fantastic project, and I really want to see it succeed I am going to alter the pricing structure to attract more backers and make DryAF a reality.
Because I am unable to change pricing for rewards which already have backers, and to avoid any complication with people having to swap around, it will be easier if I give those of you who have already backed the difference in cost as credit towards your shipping and taxes. This will all be worked out for you on completion of the campaign so you don't have to do anything.
To help boost the project, if you can share DryAF with everyone and anyone you know, that would be of great help to our cause!
Thanks for you time,
Greg
